newsitem.title: MALTA: Malta to issue 2.1 mln lira 28-day t-bills Friday.
newsitem.headline: Malta to issue 2.1 mln lira 28-day t-bills Friday.

text.p: The Malta treasury said it will issue on Friday 2.1 million Maltese lira of 28-day treasury bills maturing on September 20.
The weighted average yield is 4.9961 percent, resulting from a weighted average bid price of 99.6182, unchanged from the previous 28-day issue on August 9.

The treasury will also issue 391,000 Maltese lira of 91-day bills maturing on November 22 at a weighted average rate of 4.9974 percent per annum, equivalent to a weighted average bid price of 98.7694, slightly lower than the 4.9978 percent average rate on the previous 91-day issue on August 9. (LM1=$2.78)
